text: “allah (tamanta) daruvan æti kara gatteya” yayi ovun pavasannaha. ohu nam (mema kiyamanen) itamat parisuddhavantayeki. tavada ahashida, bhumiyehida æti (siyalla) ohuta ayiti dæyayi! me siyalla ohuta yatahat pahat vi katayutu karanava (misa, daruvan bavata pat kara ganna taram sudusu kisivak næta)
